revised_title: Spinal Cord and Cortex Excitation: Observations and Effects
tldr: The author investigates the effects of spinal cord and cortex excitation on the body, observing persistent and rhythmical movements in the mercury level, which correspond to the tonic and clonic stages of an epileptic fit. The study provides insights into the relationship between the spinal cord, cortex, and electromotive changes in the body.
